articles.title: First case of measles reported in Indiana - WSBT
articles.description: The first case of measles has been confirmed in Indiana.According to the Indiana Department of Health, the person infected is an unvaccinated child in Allen Cou
articles.content:
ALLEN COUNTY, Ind. (WSBT) The first case of measles has been confirmed in Indiana.
According to the Indiana Department of Health, the person infected is an unvaccinated child in Allen County.
